meanings.definition: A person who takes risks or opportunities, especially in a reckless or unscrupulous way.
meanings.sent1: The group of chancers decided to invest all their money in a risky business venture.
meanings.sent2: The chancers at the poker table were known for their bold moves and risky bets.
meanings.sent3: The chancers thought they could outsmart everyone, but ended up losing everything.
meanings.sent4: She saw herself as a chancer in the game of life, always willing to take a gamble.
meanings.sent5: The image of the chancers jumping off the cliff without looking back stayed in his mind.
